title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 155.7 - Notification of procedures for appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 155.7 - Notification of procedures for appeals

State Regulations

The requirement of filing an appeal from a determination of
the commissioner with the appeals board before a judicial review of such
determination may be commenced shall apply only if the appellant is provided
with written notification as to the existence of article 3-A of the Vehicle and

Traffic Law and this Part prior to or with the written notice of the
determination of the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
155.7

Amended, New

York State Register March 19, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 11, eff. 3/19/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
